Dimpshafat o t e di dumelet wego di nyaka go hlohlelet a baadimi i ba bant i mo mebasepaleng go hlokomela melao ya motheo yeo e hlohlelet ago go adima ga mebasepala. 3.    T hupamabaka ye e Lokolot wego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalat o ya Dipalopalo t a Bosenyi t eo di Begilwego t a Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Dit helete wa 2022/233.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e T hupamabaka ye e lokolot wego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalat o ya Dipalopalo t a Bosenyi t eo di Begilwego t a Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Dit helete wa 2022/23. Kabinete e dumelet e go lokollwa ga dipalopalo t a bosenyi t a kotara. Se e be e le go feto a tokollo ya ngwaga yeo e dirilwego ya dipalopalo t a bosenyi t a naga.3.2.    Dinako t eo di beilwego t eo ka t ona go tla lokollwago t hupamabaka ye ya dipalopalo t a bosenyi e tla ba ka Phato 2022 mo go tla lokollwago t a kotara ya pele gomme ye nngwe e be ka Dibatsela 2022 mo go tla lokollwago t a kotara ya bobedi. Dipalopalo t a bosenyi t a kotara ya boraro le kotara ya bone di tla lokollwa ka Dibokwane le Mopitlo 2023 ka go latelana  4.    Go fedi wa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo a Set haba (NSoD)4.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go fedi wa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo a Set haba (NSoD) seo se tsebi it wego go latela mafula ka Kapa Bohlabela le KwaZulu-Natal.4.2.    NSoD se fedi it we ka la 18 Phato 2022 go latela katolo o ya sona ka 18 Phupu 2022. Katolo o e lebelet e tlhokego ya go t wela pele go matlafat a magato a t hirelet o ao a lego gona ao a thomilego ke dibopego t a mmu o go fokot a le go  ogana le maemo a boso a  oro mo diprofenseng t eo di amegilego.4.3.    Kabinete e dumet e gore maemo a gonabjale ga a sa nyaka magato a go se tlwaelege ka ge dibopego t a mmu o, lekala la praebete le dit haba t a segae di tla t wela pele go kgonthi a gore go ba le kimollo ye e t welago pele, mpshafat o le kagolefsa. C.    Melaokakanywa 1.    Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Ngwadi o ya Mangwalo a Bodulo wa 2022 1.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Ngwadi o ya Mangwalo a Bodulo wa 2020 Palameneteng gore o lebelelwe gape. Kabinete e dumelet e Molaokakanywa ka Phupu 2020 gore o lebelelwe gape ke set haba.1.2.    Dimpshafat o t e di  i int wego di tla huet a gore go lemogwe nako ya naga yeo e  ireledit wego ka semolao ka go Karolo ya 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka 1996. Molaokakanywa o dumelela go kgoboket wa ga dipalopalo go ya ka morafe, bong, naga, bodudi bja beng ba ditokelo t a naga ka Afrika Borwa. Peakanayo ye e tla kgont ha gore go be le dipego t a tlhaki o ya naga le dinyaki i o t eo di nepaget ego ka moso malebana le pheto o ya go ba mong wa naga.  2.    Molaokakanywa wa Mokgatlo wa Infrastrakt ha wa Mothopo wa Meetse wa Set haba (NWRIA) wa 2022  2.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go phatlalat wa ga Molaokakanywa wa NWRIA wa 2022 gore set haba se swayeswaye ka mo nakong ya mat at i a 90. Molaokakanywa o akanywa go beakanywa ga NWRIA gore e t eye maikarabelo a go beakanya, go thekga ka dit helete le go kaonafat a infrastrakt ha ya naga. E tla ba gape le maikarabelo a go hlokomela infrastrakt ha ya gonabjale ya meetse.2.2.    Mokgatlo ke wa go kgonthi a go abja ga meetse ga go swarelela, ga go kwagala go sepelelana le maikarabelo a molaotheo a go fihlelela a meetse le go  irelet a tikologo ye botse. Mokgatlo o tla beakanywa bjalo ka Lekala la Set haba ka fase ga Lenaneo la 2 la Molao wa Taolo ya Dit helete t a Set haba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999). Mokgatlo o tla t ea me omo yeo e  et ego e dirwa ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority.3.    Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Maatla le Me omo ya Dit helete t a Mmasepala  3.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Maatla le Me omo ya Dit helete t a Mmasepala wa 2022. Molaokakanywa o mpshafat a Molao wa Maatla le Me omo ya Dit halete t a Mmasepala, wa 2007 (Molao wa 12 wa 2007).3.2.    Dimpshafat o di laola maatla a mebasepala mo go kgoboket eng ditshenyagelo t a tlhabollo malebana le dikgopelo t a tlhabollo ya naga t eo di i it wego mebasepaleng. Dimpshafat o t e di tla kgonthi a gore mebasepala e diri a ditshenyagelo t e ka go lekana, go sa khuti e selo le gabotse. Kabinete e dumelet e Molaokakanywa ka 2020 gore set haba se swayeswaye. 4.    Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafdit wego wa Ditaba t a Dit helete wa 2022  4.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Ditaba t a Dit helete, wa 2022. Molaokakanywa o akanya mpshafat o go Melao ye  upa, e lego (1) Molao wa Diinstitu ene t e di Amanago le Sekhwama sa Diphen ene, wa 1963 (Molao wa 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphen ene t a Ma ole, wa 1976 (Molao wa 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphen ene t a Ba omi ba Mmu o wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Dit helete le Khomi ene ya Dit helete, wa 1997 (Molao wa 99 wa 1997); (5) Molao wa Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Naga le Temo, wa 2002 (Molao wa 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Profe ene ya Tlhaki o wa 2005 (Molao wa 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Profe ene wa 2021 (Molao wa 5 wa 2021).4.2.    Dimpshafat o t e di  i int wego di akaret a, ka fase ga Molao wa Diphen ene t a Ma ole wa 1996, kakaret o ya balekane ba bophelo ka moka go dikholego go tloga morago go la 27 Phato 1994. Molao wo o mpshafadit wego wa diphen ene o tla kgont ha balekane go lemoga dikgahlego t a bona t a diphen ene ka bjako ge ba hlalana.4.3.    Go tlalelet a go hlalo a mo omo wa Tona ya Matlotlo le go hlaki a, dimpshafat o di feto a gape maatla a komiti ya phethagat o moo motlhaki i a amogelago molato. Molaokakanywa o phatlaladit we gore set haba se swayeswaye ka Dibokwane 2022. 5.    Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Melao ya Kakaret o (Molaokakanywa wo o lego Kgahlanong le go Sepet a T helete ka Tsela yeo e Sego Molaong le go Lwant ha go Adimi a T helete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa 2022 5.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Melao ya Kakaret o (Molaokakanywa wo o lego Kgahlanong le go Sepet a T helete ka Tsela yeo e Sego Molaong le go Lwant ha go Adimi a T helete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa 2022 Palamaneteng gore o lekolwe gape.5.2.    Molaokakanywa ke Molaokakanywa wa dikgoboket o woo o mpshafat ago Melao ya gonabjale e lego (i) Molao wa Senthara ya Bohlale bja Dit helete, wa 2001 (Molao wa 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Mokgatlo wo o se Nago Poelo, wa 1997 (Molao wa 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Traste ya Dithoto, wa 1988, (Molao wa 57 wa 1988); (iv) Molao wa Dikhamphani, wa 2008 (Molao wa 71 wa 2008) le (v) Molao wa Melawana ya Lekala la Dit helete, wa 2017 (Molao wa 9 wa 2017).5.3.    Dimpshafat o di arabela dipho o t eo di hwedit wego nakong ya tshekatsheko ya balekane ya naga yeo e dirilwego ke Sehlopat homo sa Magato a Dit helete (FATF). Pego ya tekolo yeo e kopanet wego e file maele a 40 ao a ka thu ago gore Afrika Borwa e sepelelane le magato a bodit habat haba a go lwant ha go sepet a t helete ka mokgwa wo o sego molaong le go lwant ha go adimi a t helete ka tswala ya godimo. 5.4.    Go hwedit we gore Afrika Borwa e hlaelela dikarolong t e 20. Molaokakanywa o  ogana le dikarolo t e dingwe t eo di utollot wego. Afrika Borwa e dut e e le leloko la FATF go tloga ka 2003. 6.    Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Diokobat i le go Reki wa ga Diokobat i wa 2022 6.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Molaokakanywa wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Diokobat i le go Reki wa ga Diokobat i wa 2022 go lekolwa go ya pele. Molao wa Diokobat i le go Reki wa ga Diokobat i, wa 1992 (Molao wa 140 wa 1992) o re ke bosenyi go dira le go aba seokobat i se sengwe le se sengwe seo se akaredit wego ka fase ga Lenaneo la 1 le Lenaneo la 2 la Molao.6.2.    Dimpshafat o di  ogana le go se nepagale ga Karolo ya 63, yeo go hwedit wego gore ga e sepelelane le molaotheo malebana le ge Tona a filwe ditokelo t a go mpshafat a mananeo ntle le go akaret a ditshepet o t a palamente.6.3.    Ka 2020, Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo e tsebi it e gore Karolo ya 63 ya Molao wa Diokobat i le go Reki wa ga Diokobat i wa 1992 ga go sepelelane le molaotheo gomme gwa emi wa nakwana go se be molao ga gona go fihla ka la 17 Manthole 2022 go fa Palamente nako ya go o loki a. D.    Tiragalo e  Tlago 1.    Papadi ya Sebjana sa Lefase ya Rugby ya 2022 1.1.    Afrika Borwa e tla ba monggae wa Sebjana sa Lefase sa Rugby sa 2022 ka Motsekapa gare ga la 9 le la 11 Lewedi 2022. Tiragalo ya papadi e swarwa la mathomo ka kontinenteng ya Afrika gomme go tla bonwa dihlopha t a banna ba 24 le basadi ba 16 go t wa lefaseng ka moka ba phadi ana. E.    Melaet a 1.    Ditebogi o        Kabinete e lebogi a le go lakalet a t e dibotse: Banyana Banyana, ka go dira histori le go thopela Afrika Borwa Africa Cup of Nations ya Basadi (WAFCON), mo makgaolakgang a WAFCON 2022 yeo e bego e swerwe ka Rabat, Morocco ka Mokibelo, 23 Mosegamanye 2022. Ka nako ye tee, ba fihlelet e dinyakwa t a go phadi anela Sefoka sa Lefase sa FIFA go swarwa mmogo ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la 20 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 23 Phato 2023.Team South Africa, ka go thopa dimetale t e 27 mo dikarolong t a go fapana mo Dipapading t a Commonwealth t eo di swerwego Birmingham, England go tloga ka la 28 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 8 Phato 2022. Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ge ba thopile kgahlanong le Spain mo phadi anong ya mathomo ya t e pedi ya diteko t a Mohlwaela wa Marega t a Basadi mo Emirates Airline Park go la Johannesburg.Mohumagadi Ndavi Nokeri (23), go thopa sefoka sa Mohumagadi Afrika Borwa 2022.Mohumagadi Ashleigh Buhai, ka go thopa 2022 AIG Women s Open gomme ya ba mosadi wa boraro ka Afrika Borwa go thopa sefoka sa gauta se segolo.2.  Mahloko         Kabinete e romela melaet a ya mahloko go: Tokollo  Magesh  Tshabalala (46), rammino, seopedi le mongwadi wa diko a yoo a ilego a tuma ge yena mmogo le bagwera ba gagwe ba babedi ba thoma sehlopha sa bona sa mmino sa kwaito ka 1996 seo se bit wago TKZee.3.   Bao ba Thwet wego Me omong1.    Batho ka moka bao ba thwet wego me omong mangwalo a bona a dithuto a tla tii et wa le go netefat wa ka maleba. 1.1.    Mohumagadi Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo bjalo ka Motlat amolaodimogophethi i (DDG): Dinyaki i o t a Pholisi le Melawana mo Kgorong ya Me omo ya Set haba le Infrastrakt ha (DPWI).1.2.    Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole bjalo ka DDG: Senthara ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo a Set haba ka Kgorong ya Taolo ya Tiri ano.1.3.    Morena Adam Mthombeni bjalo ka DDG: Dikamano t a Bodit habat haba mo DPWI.2.    Kabinete e dumelelana le go thwala batho ba me omong:2.1.    Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolophethi i wa Institute ya Tlhabollo ya Enet i ya Set haba ya Afrika Borwa. 2.2.    Maloko a Nakwana a Taolo ya Enet i ya Set haba ya Afrika Borwa:a.    Morena Thembani Bukula (Modulasetulo);b.    Mohumagadi Zandile Mpungose (Motlat amodulasetulo); c.    Mohumagadi Precious Sibiya;d.    Mohumagadi Thembeka Semane; lee.    Morena Fungai Sibanda (go thwalwa gape).2.3.    Modulasetulo le leloko la Khansele ya Boto ya Theknolot i ya Diminerale: a.    Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetulo); leb.    Profesa Lwazi Ngubevana. 2.4.    Mohumagadi Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe bjalo ka Molaodiphethi i wa Selete wa Mokgatlo wa T hirelet o ya Leago wa Afrika Borwa ka KwaZulu-Natal.Dipot i o:Mohumagadi Phumla Williams   Seboleledi sa KabineteMogala: 083 501 0139

title: Pego ya Kopano ya Kabinete ye e Swerwego ka Mokgwa wa Inthanete Laboraro, 31 Phato 2022
text: A. Ditaba t e di Amago Badudi1. Ekonomi1.1. Kabinete e amogela go ya fase gannyane ga palo ya batho bao ba sa  omego ka nageng, yeo e ilego fase ka 0.6%, go tloga go 34.5% mo kotareng ya mathomo go ya go 33.9% mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022. Dipalopalo t eo di phatlaladit wego ka Dinyaki i ong t a Ba omi t a Kotara ye Nngwe le ye Nngwe ke Dipalopalo t a Afrika Borwa di bont ha gore me omo ye ment i e bile gona ka go Ditirelo t a Set haba le t a Leago (276 000), ka lekaleng la Kgwebo (169 000), la Dit helete (128 000) le lekaleng la Kago (104 000).1.2. Palomoka ya batho bao ba thwet wego e eme go 15, 6 milione mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022, gomme palo ya batho bao ba sa  omego e oket egile ka batho ba 132 000 gomme ya fihla dimilione t e seswai mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022 ge go bapet wa le kotara ya go feta.1.3. Dipoelo t e t a go kgahli a gape t a go kwagala di bont ha gore maitapi o ao a kopanet wego a mmu o le badiri ani ba wona ba leago a go godi a ekonomi le go hlola me omo yeo e hlokegago a thoma go t welet a dipoelo t e dibotse.1.4. Se ke bohlatse bja gore ge ka moka re  oma mmogo ka go kopanya bokgoni bja rena, re ka fenya ditlhohlo t eo di lebanego le ekonomi ya rena.1.5. Kabinete e kwe i a matshwenyego a maAfrika Borwa ge ba palelwa ke go phela gabotse ka lebaka la bophelo bja go bit a t helete ye nt i le palo ya godimo ya go hloka mo omo. Bjalo ka mmu o wo o hlokomelago batho ba wona, re dula re tiile le go ikgafa go  oma mmogo le badiri ani ba rena ba leago go aga bokamoso bjo bokaone bja yo mongwe le yo mongwe. Mmu o o dula o ikgafile go thekga dikgwebo t a gae ka go reka dithoto le go  omi a ditirelo t a t ona.2. Infrastrakt ha ya Set haba2.1. Kabinete e kgala ka bogala go senywa ga infrastrakt ha ke badudi ba Tongaat ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya megwanto ya go nyaka meetse. Kabinete e ipelet a gore batho ba i e matswalo fase gape ba be le kgotlelelo ka ge mo omo o t wela pele go loki a Tongaat Water Treatment Works. 2.2. Kabinete e kwe i a matshwenyego a badudi bao ba swanelago ke go  omi a ditanka t a meetse nako ye telele go tloga mola go bago le mafula pejana mo ngwageng wo. Le ge go le bjalo, dikgaruru le tlhakahlakano ga se tharollo, gomme go senywa ga infrastrakt ha ya set haba go kwe a set haba seo se dulago moo bohloko.3. Molao wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Mananeo a Mebasepala ya Mmu o wa Selegae wa 20223.1. Kabinete e amogela go saenelwa go ba molao ga Molao wo o Mpshafadit wego wa Mananeo a Mebasepala ya Mmu o wa Selegae, wa 2022 (Molao wa 3 wa 2022) ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa. Maikemi et o a molao ke go kaonafat a bokgoni le maemo a maitshwaro a mmu o wa selegae. Mmu o o bopa karolo ya maitapi o go dira gore Tirelo ya Set haba e be ya profe ene le go kgonthi a go swarelela ga kabo ya ditirelo go batho, bjalo ka tokelo ya motheo yeo e  ireledit wego ka go Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996.3.2. Molao o hlalo a ditshepet o t eo di swanet wego go latelwa mo go thwaleng ga bahlankedi ba mmasepala maemong a godimo. Bjale ga o sa dumela gore bahlenkedibagolo ba mmu o ba sware gape maemo a godimo mo mekgatlong ya dipolotiki. Se sengwe gape ke gore ge molao wo o tsene tiri ong, diposo t a bolaodi bja mmasepala t eo di se a tlat wago di swanet e go kwalakwat wa nageng ka bophara go goka batho ba bant i bao ba nago le maswanedi.3.3. Kabinete e tshepa gore diphetogo t e di tla kgonthi a gore bao ba thwet wego goba ba kgethilwego mo maemong a ba tla kgona go phethagat a ditshepi o t a bona gore re fihlelele bophelo bjo bobotse go batho ka moka.4. Bosenyi4.1. Kabinete e retile bahlenkedi ba met helo ba Tirelo ya Met helo ya Afrika Borwa ka go thopa seokobat i sa crystal meth seo ge o se reki a e ka bago R236 milione mo Boemafofaneng bja Bodit habat haba bja OR Tambo ka Lamorena, 28 Phato 2020. Go thop a ga seokobat i go tla romela temo o ye maatla go dihlopha t a basenyi gore matseno le mat o a maemafofane a rena a  ireledit we gabotse gomme bahlankedi ba rena ba  oma ka maatla go fedi a bosenyi bofe goba bofe.B. Diphetho t a Kabinete1. Pego ya Khansele ya Thuto ya Godimo (CHE) ya Nyaki i o ya Megolo ya Batlat abakhanseliri ba Diyunibesithi le Baolaodibagolophethi i ka Afrika Borwa1.1. Kabinete e tsebi it we ka dipoelo t a nyaki i o ya CHE yeo e dumelet wego ka 2020 ke Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafat o, Ngaka Blade Nzimande, go lekola magato a megolo le mekgwa ya go phela ya bahlenkediphethi i ba yunibesithi mo nakong ya mengwaga ye 15 go tloga ka 2005 go fihla ka 2019.1.2. Dinyaki i o e be e le t a go utolla go swarelela, kgonagalo le kaonafat o ya diyunibesithi goba lekala la thuto ya godimo ka mo nageng. Pego ye e akaret a dikutollo t a motheo gammogo le maele a tuki o ao a akant wego.1.3. Maele a akanya, gare ga t e dingwe, tshepet o ya ditefo ya go se khuti e selo yeo e matlafadit ego. Go beakanya mokgatlo wa taolo wa ka ntle wa go ikema go lebelela tshepet o ya go t ea sephetho sa megolo. E akanya gape go matlafat a mananeo a tekolo ya phethagat o mo diinstitu eneng. Dinyaki i o di lebelet e gape bogolo bja go fapana bja diinstitu ene gape e dirile gape papet o ya bodit habat haba.1.4. Go letet we gore Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafat o a boledi ane ka pego ye le boetapele bja yunibesithi bjalo ka magato a go matlafat a diinstitu ene t e t a thuto. Pego e tla re ka morago ya phatlalat wa wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Thuto ya Godimo le Tlhahlo: www.dhet.gov.za.2. Pheto o ye e Potlaki it wego ya Bokgoni bja Dinyaki i o le Go ruta mo Lekaleng la Thuto ya Godimo2.1. Kabinete e thekgile maele a dinyaki i o t e pedi t eo di dirilwego go elet a ka magato ao a swanet wego go t ewa go potlaki a go bokgoni bja pheto o ya dinyaki i o le go ruta mo diinstitu eneng t a thuto ya godimo.2.2. Pego ya mathomo e dirilwe ke Sehlophat homo sa Ditona seo se nyaki i ago mapheko ao a thibelago kalat o, go swarelela le t welopele ya dirutegi t a maAfrika Borwa a bathobaso. Pego ya bobedi   yeo e dirilwego ke Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonafat o le Setheo sa Dinyaki i o sa Set haba   Mokgatlo wa Diyunibesithi wa Afrika Borwa, mokgatlo wo mogolo wa go emela diyunibesithi t e 26 ka mo nageng.2.3. Dipego t e ka moka di akanya mekgwa ya go tsena gare go potlaki a phetogo mo dikarolong t e dikgolo t e hlano, e lego tatelano ya dialogadigolwane; go kgatha tema ga ba omi; set o le tiri o ya institu ene; pholisi le mekgwa, le methopo ye mennyane.3. Tumelelano ya Bodit habat haba ka ga Methopo ya Leabela la Dimela t a Dijo le Temo (Tumelelano)3.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Tumelelano ya Palamente gore e hwet agale. Se se tla kgont ha Afrika Borwa go ba karolo ya mekgatlo ya Tumelelano, yeo e hlahlago maloko a dinaga go  irelet a le go kgonthi a t homi o ya go swarelela ya methopo ya leabela la dimela t a dijo le temo.3.2. Go fihlelela Tumelelano ye go tla matlafat a boikgafo bja naga mo go bolokeng le go swareleleng t homi o ya methopo ya leabela la dimela, le go fa thekgo go dit haba t a magaeng.4. Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa4.1. Kabinete e dumelet e gore Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa e phethagat we. Tlhako e t welet a pono ya go abelana ya Afrika Borwa ya go kwagala, ya klaemete ye maatla. E hlalo a melao le dikarolo t a pholisi go fihlelela se. Tlhako ya phetogo e tla huet a mang le mang ka Afrika Borwa, gomme ya fa sebaka sa go  ogana le go se lekalekane ga kgale le go hlola ekonomi ye e holago batho ka moka.4.2. Khomi ene ya Klaemete ya Mopresidente e dirile mokgwa wa poledi ano wo mogolo le badiri ani ba leago gomme ya amogela thekgo ye kgolo ya tlhako. Kabinete e kgonthi it e gore phetogo go tloga go ekonomi ye e se nago khapone ka 2050 e swanet e go thekga maikemi et o a tlhabollo ya set haba, go akaret a me omo ye mekaone go batho ka moka, kakaret o ya leago le go fedi wa ga bohloki.4.3. Kabinete e ipilet a go badiri ani ka moka ba leago go thekga le go amogela tlhako ye. Leano la phethagat o leo le tlet ego la tlhako le tla dirwa, gomme le tla kopanywa le peakanyo ya mmu o le lenaneo la tekanyet o.5. Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ye Mpsha ya Afrika Borwa5.1. Kabinete e dumelet e gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ya gonabjale e t eelwe legato ke ye mpsha ya go ba le dibopego t a go bolokega kudu.5.2. Karata ye e  omi wago gonabjale e thomile go  omi wa go tloga ka 1998. Theknolot i e fetogile gomme go bit a t helete ye nt i go hlokomela dikarata t e. Karata ye mpsha ye e tla  omi wago e tla dira gore laesense ya naga ya rena ya go otlela e sepelelane le Theknolot i ya Bodit haba ya go Obamela Tshedimo o ya Boitsebi o bja Motho mo Laesenseng ya go Otlela (ISO18013).6. Pholisi ya Lenaneo la Me omo ya Set haba ye e Katolo it wego (EPWP)6.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go phatlalat wa ka kuranteng ya set haba Pholisi ya EPWP ye e akant wego gore set haba se swayeswaye. EPWP ke ye nngwe ya mananeo a motheo a mmu o ao maikemi et o e lego go fa kimollo go bohloki le letseno ka go hlola dibaka t a me omo ya nakwana, kudu go bafsa le basadi.6.2. Pholisi ye mpsha ye e akant wego e tla matlafat a lenaneo gomme ya hlalo a dikarolo t a go swana le megolo, mmotlolo wa thekgo ya dit helete le t hirelet o ya leago, ya nyalant ha EPWP le ditiri o t a me omo t e diswa. E tla godi a ditiri ano gare ga mmu o le lekala la praebete mo go kgonthi eng gore EPWP e kgatha tema kudu mo go hloleng me omo ya seriti le go fokot a bohloki. Pholisi e tla godi a gape kaonafat o mo go phethagat eng ga mananeo a me omo ya set haba go phatlalala le naga.7. Dimpshafat o t a Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa7.1. Kabinete e dumelet e sebopego, moakanyet o le kgoboket o ya Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa. E dumelet e lenaneo la go  ielana la ngwaga le ngwaga la t homi o ya dipolelo t a semmu o mo go mohlwaela wa khoine ya desimale ya bone.7.2. Lent u  Afrika Borwa  le tla tsenywa ka lehlakoreng le lengwe la dikhoine gomme la gati wa ka dipolelo ka moka t a semmu o. Dipolelo t e tharo di tla  omi wa go khoine ya R5; dipolelo t e pedi go dikhoine t a R2; 50c, 20c le 10c gomme R1 e tla ba ka polelo e tee. Dipolelo t e ka moka di tla  omi wa ka go  ielana mo mengwageng ye 10.8. Pholisi ya 2022 ye e Kopant wego ya Taolo ya Boleng bja Meetse ye e Akanywago8.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go phatlalat wa ka kuranteng ya mmu o ga Pholisi ya IWQM ye e Akanywago gore set haba se swayeswaye. Pholisi ye e akant wego e tla ema legato la Pholisi ya WQM ya kgale ya 1991 le mokgwa wa yona wo o beakant wego ka 2006.8.2. Pholisi e hlalo a sehlopha sa melao yeo e dirago motheo wa taolo ya boleng bja meetse. E sepelelana le melao ka moka ye e lebanego le meetse le maikgafo ka moka a lefase a naga go maemo le pabalelo ya meetse bjalo ka mothopo wo o hlokegago.9. Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoelet o bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye e Akanywago9.1. Kabinete e amoget e go phatlalat wa ga Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoelet o bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye e Akanywago gore set haba se swayeswaye. Boipoelet o bja Radio ke mothopo wa tlhago wo monnyane woo o lego bohlokwa go kgolo ya ekonomi ya tit itale ya Afrika Borwa le infrastrakt ha ya kgokagano.9.2. Pholisi ye e akant wego e ikemi edit e go thekga go abelwa ga mehuta ya  dilaesense t a go fihlelela megala ya go thetha ya go se  ute, dilaesense t a kga o, t a mananeokgoparara a dikgokagano t a difofane le t a dikepe; t a dinyaki i o le tlhabollo; t a mananeokgoparara a go  omi wa ke set haba, le diintasteri t e dingwe t a maleba. Pholisi e nyaka gape go godi a tekatekano le kabo ya go kwagala go kgatha tema mo pheto ong ya lekala le phihlelelo ya kgokagano ya tit itale le mo go dikarolo t a kgole t a naga.10. Kgopelo ya Afrika Borwa ya Khansele ya Mokgatlo wa Kgokagano ya Bodit habat haba (ITU) le Boto ya Melawana ya Radio10.1. Kabinete e dumelet e kgopelo ya Morena Mandla Samuel Mchunu go Boto ya Melawana ya Radio ya ITU (Selete sa D). Morena Mchunu gonabjale ke leloko la boto. O akanyedit we go kgethwa gape mo Khanseleng ya ITU go kotara ya 2023 go fihla ka 2026.10.2. Dikgetho di tla swarwa nakong ya Khonferense ya Baemedi ba ITU yeo e tla swarwago Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la 26 Lewedi go fihla ka la 14 Diphalane 2022. Afrika Borwa e dula e ikgafile go dinepo le maikemi et o a ITU a go kgokaganya karoganyo ya tit itale le go kgokaganya batho ka moka ba lefase.C. Ditiragalo t e di Tlago1. Kgwedi ya Bohwa1.1. Kgwedi ya Bohwa ya Lewedi ngwaga wo e tla ketekwa ka fase ga morero:  Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Set o wa Afrika Borwa . Kabinete e hlohlelet a maAfrika Borwa ka moka go  omi a Kgwedi ya Bohwa go keteka bohwa bja rena bja set o bja go huma le phapano yeo e nago le maatla a go kopanya set haba. Ka moka re swanet e go ikgafa go  oma mmogo go fedi a dikarologanyo le go hloka toka ga nako ya go feta le go godi a temogo ya go ikgant ha ka go ba maAfrika Borwa.D. Melaet a 1. Ditebogi oKabinete e lebogi a le go lakalet a t e dibotse go:Bathopasefoka ka moka, bathopa dimetale le baphadi ani bao ba kgathilego tema mo Lebelong la Comrades, leo le tsebegago bjalo ka  Lebelo la Batho la go a Phala ka Moka, ka Lamorena, 28 Phato 2022. Lebelo la banna le thopilwe ke Tete Dijane (Diiri t e 5, metsotso ye 30, metsotswana ye 38) go t wa Mahikeng ka Leboa Bodikela mola mokitimi wa Russia Alexandra Morozova a thopile lebelo la basadi (Diiri t e 6, metsotso ye 17, metsotswana ye 47).1. MahlokoKabinete e romela melaet a ya mahloko go:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), molwelatokologo wa kgale yoo e bego e le moamogedi wa Sefoka sa Set haba sa Luthile ka 2004 ka  go kgatha tema ga gagwe mo go lweleng tokologo ya ditokelo t a ba omi le temogo go go se kgetholle ka mmala, ka bong, le Afrika Borwa ye e lokologilego ya toka .Bahlenkedi ba Ditirelo t a Maphodisa a Afrika Borwa (SAPS) ba bahlano bao e bego e le banamedi ba sefofane sa SAPS seo se welego Boemafofaneng bja Rand, Germiston ka Labobedi, 30 Phato 2022. SAPS e nyaki i a seo se hlot ego go wa ga sona. Kabinete e lakalet a mofofi i yoo a gobet ego kudu gore a fole ka pela.E. Bao ba Thwet wego Me omong1.  Batho ka moka bao ba thwet wego me omong mangwalo a bona a dithuto a tla tii et wa le go netefat wa ka maleba.a. Mohumagadi Gugulethu Abigail Thimane bjalo ka Motlat amolaodimogophethi i (DDG):Tekolo ya Lekala la Mmu o le Tlhabollo ya Bokgoni ka go Kgoro ya Peakanyo, Tekodi i o le Tshekatsheko ya Phethagat o ya Mo omo.b. Mohumagadi Kwena Komape bjalo ka DDG: Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi, Kgwebo le Papat o ka go Kgoro ya Temo, Peakanyoleswa ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagae.c. Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole bjalo ka DDG: Senthara ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo a Set haba mo Kgorong ya Pu otiri ano.2. Kabinete e dumelelana le go thwala batho ba me omong:a. Morena Songezo Booi bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolophethi i (CEO): Khansele ya Baagi ba Magae a Set haba.b. Boto ya Dinyaki i o t a Meepo ya Afrika le Tiri ano ya Dit helete:(i) Morena Zacharias Bernardus Swanepoel (Modulasetulo);(ii) Morena Mzwandile Zwelinzima Themba Masondo; le(iii) Mohumagadi Phumzile Mthombeni (Molaodimogolophethi i).c. Morena Patrick Dlamini bjalo ka CEO (Katolo o ya Dikontraka t a Ba omi) wa Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Borwa bja Afrika.Dipot i o: Mohumagadi Phumla Williams   Seboleledi sa KabineteMogala: 083 501 0139

title: Pego ya Kopano ya Kabinete ye e Swerwego ka Mokgwa wa Inthanete  Laboraro, 21 Lewedi 2022
text: A. Ditaba t e di Amago Badudi1. Mohlagase1.1. Tona ya Dikgwebo t a Mmu o Pravin Gordhana o beget e kabinete ka bokgoni bja Eskom bja go fokot a go kgaot wa ga mohlagase ga nako le nako gape e filwe pego ya seo se  et wego se dirilwe go t wa Komiting ya Semmu o ya Komiti ya Mathata a Mohlagase ya Set haba.1.2. Go tla dirwa ditsebi o t e dingwe go latela go phethwa ga dipoledi ano t a go tsenelela t a dipego t e.1.3. Kabinete e t weledit e manyami ka t hiti o le mathata ao a hlolwago ke go kgaolwa ga mohlagase go dikgwebo le magae, kudu di direga ka nako yeo mmu o o swaraganego le ditsenogare t eo di tsebi it wego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Mosegamanye 2022.2. Peelet o2.1. Kabinete e amogela go thakgolwa ga Lefelo le lefsa la T welet o la Sandvik Khomanani ka Kempton Park, leo e bego e le karolo ya peelet o ya R350 milione yeo e tshepi it wego mo Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeelet o ya Afrika Borwa (SAIC) yeo e bego e swerwe Senthareng ya Dikopano ya Sandton ka Johannesburg ka la 24 Hlakola 2022.2.2. Mothopo wo mofsa wa dikwere metara t e 62 000 o kopanya ditshepet o t eo di thomilwego pele mo mafelong a go fapana a mahlano gomme di akaret a ba omi bao e ka bago ba 550. Ke ye nngwe ya methopo ye megolo go feta ka moka ya Sandvik gape ya maemo a godimo lefaseng ka moka, gomme e na le bokgoni bja go t welet a met hene ya go lai a ya ka fase ga mabu ya go ba le dit welet wa t a Afrika Borwa t a 60%.2.3. Kabinete e amogela gape ketelo ya tekolo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya thakgolo ya mothopo wa t welet o wa Hesto Harnesses ka Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Lewedi 2022. Mothopo wo ke wo mongwe wa diprot eke t a dipeelet o t a t helete t e hlano t eo di dirago karolo ya boikgafo bja R1.4 bilione bja Metair Investments Limited go thekga katolo o le go dira Ford Ranger ye mpsha ya gae.2.4. Mopresidente o tsenet e gape go bulwa ga mpshafat o le katolo o ya prot eke ya Sappi Saiccor Mill ye e bit ago R7,7 bilione ka Umkomaas, yeo maikemi et o a yona e lego go godi a bokgoni le katlego ya lefase ya khamphani mola ka go le lengwe e hlola dibaka t a mo omo t a nako ye kopana le nako ye telele.2.5. Dipeelet o t e di dira karolo ya maikano ao a dirilwego ke boraintasteri mo SAIC. Peelet o ye nngwe le ye nngwe ye mpsha ka nageng ya rena e thu a go kagolefsa le kaonafat o ya ekonomi ya rena, gomme e t wela pele go akaret a Afrika Borwa bjalo ka nepo ya peelet o ya kgetho.3. Tlhabollo ya infrastrakt ha3.1. Kabinete e amogela go bulwa ga karolo ye mpsha ya Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ka Limpopo yeo e tla dirago gore go be bonolo go batho go sepela ka Musina, gomme ya dumelela gape me ongwana ya kgwebo le ekonomi gare ga Afrika Borwa le dinaga t a Dit haba t a Tlhabollo t a Borwa bja Afrika. Prot eke ya R640 milione e hlot e me omo ye 275 ya go ya go ile ya batho ba gae gomme ya aba dibaka go dit haba t a gae le dikgwebo t e dinnyane le t e dikgolo gammogo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME).3.2. Go agwa ga Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ke karolo ya lenaneo la infrastrakt ha ya mmu o, ka ERRP, yeo e nyakago go hlola kgolo ya kakaret o le dibaka t a me omo go phatlalala le makala le dit haba.4. Masetlapelo a Jagersfontein4.1. Kabinete e romet e melaet a ya mahloko go malapa a bao ba lahleget wego ke maphelo a bona ka morago ga tirigalo ya masetlapelo ya go palega le go t hologa ga leraga mo moepong wa selegae wo o tloget wego o sa  ome ka Jagersfontein ka Freistata mo maseng a Lamorena, 11 Lewedi 2022. Masetlapelo a tloget e gape infrastrakt ha ya selegae, dithoto t a batho t a go swana le dikoloi le magae a mmalwa a senyegile kudu.4.2. Nakong ya ketelo ya gagwe mo lefelong la masetlapelo ka Mo upologo, 12 Lewedi 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa o lebogile maitapi o a go pholo a le go hwet a batho le dithoto ao a dirilwego mo lefelong la masetlapelo. O ikanne gape gore mmu o o tla fa thekgo yeo e hlokegago go badudi bao ba amegilego ba Jagersfontein. Kabinete e hlohlelet wa ke gore beng ba moepo ba re ba ikemi edit e go aba thu o ye e hlokegago le thekgo go mmu o ge e ka kgopelwa ke Khansele ya Diminirale ya Afrika Borwa.4.3. Intasteri ya meepo e dula e le mothekgi yo bohlokwa wa ekonomi ka go thwala thwii goba go se thwale thwii, megolo ya ki ontle, le peelet o ya thwii ya dinaga t a ka ntle, gomme e kgatha tema ye bohlokwa mo go kaonafat eng maphelo a dit haba t a meepong.4.4. Mmu o le mekgatlo ye mengwe yeo e sego ya mmu o ba tsene ka bogare ka bjako ka go fa batho bao ba amegilego madulo a nakwana a t hoganet o, thobamatswalo ya kgatelelo ya monagano le let hogo le dilo t eo di hlokegago go swana le mapai, materase le diphuthelwana t a dijo. Kabo ya meetse le mohlagase mo lefelong e bu edit we sekeng.4.5. Go letet we gore dient enere di dire tekolo ya dibopego t a dintlo, ge lefelo la masetlapelo le hlweki it we. Kabinete e leboga ditirelo t a t hoganet o, mekgatlo ya set haba ya segae le maloko a set haba ka tema yeo ba e kgathilego ye kgolo le thu o yeo ba e filego bat wasehlabelo.5. Ekonomi5.1. Kabinete e t weledit e maemo a ekonomi ka nageng ka morago ga ge dipalolopalo t a kgauswanyane t a Kgoro ya Dipalopalo ya Afrika Borwa (Stats SA) di bont ha gore palomoka ya t welet o ya gae (GDP) ya kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 e fokot egile ka 0,7%. Dilo t eo di huedit ego phokot ego ye di akaredit e kgaot o ya mohlagase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le maemo a go phela a go bit a t helete ye nt i le infle ene.5.2. Ditsenogare t eo di dirilwego ke Leano la Kaonafat o le Kagolefsa ya Ekonomi (ERRP) di fokodit e kudu naga go dikhuet o t a bodit habat haba, gape t a  irelet a me omo le letseno. Ditsenogare t e maatla t a ekonomi t a mmu o di thoma go t welet a dipoelo t e dibotse, bjale ka ge go hlatset we ka go dipoelo t a Dinyaki i o t a Ba omi t a Kotara ye nngwe le ye nngwe t a Stats SA, t eo di bont hit ego gore go bile le me omo ye 648 000 mo kotareng ya mathomo le ya bobedi t a 2022.B. Diphetho t a Kabinete1. Tlhako ya Tlhahlobo le Tekolo (M&E) ya Pholisi ya Bafsa ya Set haba (NYP)1.1. Kabinete e dumelet e tlhako ya M&E yeo e tla kgont hago tlhahlobo le kelo ya khuet o ya dintlha t a bohlokwa t a NYP ya 2020-2030. Tlhako e fa ditaet i t a legato la godimo t e hlano t eo di sepelelanago le dintlha t a bohlokwa t a NYP.1.2. Ditaet i di dirilwe le bakgathatema ba maleba bao ba nago le kgahlego mo tlhabollong le matlafat ong ya bafsa ka mo nageng. Tshedimo o e tla kgoboket wa ka go aroganywa ka dikarolo go ya ka mengwaga, bong, bogolofadi, sehlopha sa merafe le tikologo ya thutafase ya ditsenogare t e.1.3. Dikgato t e t a go dira ditlhahlobo di tla dirwa ka mafelong ka moka a mmu o, ka ditheong ka moka le lekaleng la praebete. Dipego t a t ona di tla dirwa kotareng ye nngwe le ye nngwe gomme t a phatlalat wa gabedi ka ngwaga.2. Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye e Kopant wego2.1. Kabinete e dumelet e Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye e Kopant wego ya mmu o, yeo e nyakago go  ogana le mafokodi a peakanyo ya pholisi ao a utollot wego mo lenaneong la peakanyo la gonabjale.2.2. Ditsenogare t eo di  i int wego di tla re gare ga t e dingwe t a  ogana le tlhokego ya tlhopo ya peakanyo mo dikarolong t e tharo t a mmu o. Ditsenogare di tla tsebi a mokgwa wa tlhahlobo wo o theilwego go bohlatse. Tlhako ya pholisi e tsebi it e gape kakanyo ye bonolo ka peakanyo ya nako ye telele go ya magareng le peakanyo ya nako ye kopana go phatlalala le mmu o.2.3. E tla  omela go thoma dimpshafat o t a melao go kaonafat a kopano le kakanyo mo peakanyong le tlhahlobong ya mmu o.3. Tumelelo ya Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga Mokgatlo wa Dihlare t a Seafrika (AMA)3.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go saenwa ga Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga AMA le go i wa ga yona Palamenteng go ka dumelelwa. Se se tla phetha tumelelano yeo e amogelwago ke Kopano ya Tumelelano ya Afrika ka 2019. Tumelelano e thoma semmu o AMA ya kontinente. Mokgatlo o tla laola dit welet wa t a dihlare, gomme wa kaonafat a polokego le bokgoni bja dit welet wa t a dihlare ka kontinenteng.3.2. Go saenwa le go dumelelwa ga tumelelano ye go tla kaonafat a boikgafo bja Afrika Borwa mo lefaseng le mo kontinenteng mo go matlafat eng lenaneo la taolo ya kontinente mo go dit welet wa t a maphelo.4. Pego ka ga Lenaneo la Tlhohlelet o ya Mot helo la Phethagat o ya Dinyaki i o le Tlhabollo (R&D)   2019/20 le 2020/214.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Lenaneo la tlhohlelet o ya Mot helo la R&D Palamenteng mo mengwageng ye mebedi ya go feta (2019/20 le 2020/21). Se se sepelelana le karolo ya 11D (17) ya Molao wa Mot helo wa Letseno, wa 1962 (Molao wa 58 wa 1962), woo o nyakago go alwa ga dipego t e ka Palamenteng.4.2. Lenaneo la tlhohlelet o ya mot helo le nyaka go hlohlelet a dikhamphani t a praebete go beelet a mo go R&D gore go hlohlelet we kgolo ya ekonomi, le go godi a katlego.4.3. Kabinete e thabela gore pego e bont ha gore dikhamphani t e difsa di dirile kgopelo ya tlhohlelet o ya mot helo. E hlohlelet a dikhamphani t e dint i go hwet a setlamo se bjalo ka karolo ya go godi a dipeelet o t a bona le go hlohlelet a kgolo ya ekonomi.4.4. Dikhamphani t e nne t a godimo t eo di hwedit ego tlhohlelet o ya mot helo di ka makaleng a tshepet o ya dit welet wa t a temo; kaonafat o ya meepo; dikhemikhale, dibotsefat i, dihlare le elektrotheknikhale le Theknolot i ya Tshedimo o t eo Kabinete e di dumelet ego bjalo ka dikarolo t e bohlokwa mo Leanong la Katlego ya Pholisi ya Intasteri. Pego ka botlalo e ka hwet wa mo wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonofat o: www.dst.gov.za.5. Foramo ya Molao wa Dibaka le Kgolo ya Afrika (AGOA) - 20235.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go swarwa ga Foramo ya AGOA ka 2023. AGOA e dumelet we ke Amerika (USA) ka 2000 go fa phihlelelo ya go ikgetha ya kgwebo ya go ikema go bont i bja dinaga t a Afrika t a Borwa bja Sahara le mebaraka ya gae ya USA.5.2. Diki ontle t a Afrika Borwa ka fase ga AGOA di akaret a dienywa t a go but wa, dimake, dikoloi, didiri wa, t hipi, setala le dit welet wa t a khemikhale. T at ikgwedi la nnete le lefelo di sa tlo tsebi wa.6. Samiti ya Ditona ya Sehlopha sa Ditlhahlobo t a Lefase (GEO)   20236.1. Kabinete e dumelet e gore Afrika Borwa e sware Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO ka Motsekapa ka 2023. GEO ke mokgatlo wa mebu o ya bodit habat haba woo o hlomilwego ka 2003 ka morago ga Samiti ya Lefase ya Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela. E  oma bjalo ka sefala sa kopano moo dinaga di kgathago tema ka go ithaopa go fihlelela nepo ya go swana ya go aga mananeo a GEO.6.2. Gonabjale GEO e na le mebu o ya boset haba ya go feta 113, ye 30 ya yona e t wago ka Afrika gomme mekgatlo ye e ka bago 140 e kgatha tema, gomme ye 11 ya yona e t wa Afrika. Afrika Borwa e dut e e le leloko la Komitiphethi i go tloga ka 2005 gomme boramahlale ba rena gonabjale ba kgatha tema mananeong a dinyaki i o a mmalwa ao a etilwego pele ke GEO.7. Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa ya Diphalane (OTM)   20227.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go thakgolwa ga lesolo la OTM ka Mokibelo, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fase ga morero:  Sishov ingolovane: mmogo re aga infrastrakt ha ya dinamelwa yeo e agago me omo ya go swarelela .7.2. OTM ya ngwaga le ngwaga e  omi wa go godi a temo o ka dinamelwa bjalo ka dikarolo t e bohlokwa mo kgolong ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya mahlakore a mararo. Go tla ba le ditiragalo t e mmalwa go bont ha dikarolo t e mmalwa t a infrastrakt ha ya dinamelwa ka go difofane, dikepe, dinamelwa t a bohle le ditsela. Ditiragalo di lemo a gape ka polokego le t hirelet o ya dinamelwa. Go tla akaret wa gape bakgathatema go boledi ana ka ditlhohlo t a go fapana mo lekaleng la dinamelwa.7.3. Mmu o o dula o ikgafile mo go kaonafat eng infrastrakt ha ya dinamelwa ya naga, bobedi mo mafelong a segae le a setoropong, gore go sepet we tshepelo ye botse gape ya bokgoni ya dithoto le batho.8. Kopano ya Lenaneo la Magae la Bodulo bja Batho (UN-HABITAT) la Kopanodit haba (UN)8.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go swarwa ga kopano ya maloko a UN-HABITAT ka Johannesburg ka la 16 Diphalane 2022.8.2. Kgoro ya Bodulo bja Batho e tla sepet a kopano ye ya mat at i a mabedi yeo e tla tsenelwago ke ditsebi t a dipolotiki, ditsebi le banyaki i i, go akaret a malokomagolo a Komiti ya go ya go ile ya Baemedi ba UN-HABITAT bao ba lego Nairobi, Kenya. Ditaba t e bohlokwa t eo go tla bolelwago ka t ona di tla akaret a ditsenogare t a phetogo go badudi ba mekhukhung le metsesetoropo go tlala kudu.8.3. Dipoelo t a dipoledi ano t e di tla phethwa mo thakgolong ya Tlhako ya Leano la Katlego la Lefase, yeo e tla alwago Kopanong ya UN-HABITAT gore e dumelelwe ka 2023.C. Melaokakanywa1. Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Set haba ya Dikgaruru t a Bong le Dipolao t a Basadi le Bana (GBVF) wa 20211.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa ga Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Set haba ya 2021 Palamenteng gore go  oganwe le wona. Molaokakanywa wo o fa tlhako ya molao mo go hlongweng ga mokgatlo wa molao gore go be le tsenogare ye e nepi ago mo go  oganeng le GBVF.1.2. O dumelela gape go thongwa ga Boto ya Khansele yeo e tla fago taolo yeo e beakant wego gomme ya laola phethagat o ya Leano la Taolo ya Set haba ka ga GBVF, leo le dumelet wego ke Kabinete ka Diphalane 2020 go phethagat wa. Boto e tla le kemedi ya 51 go t wa go set haba sa gae le 49% go t wa mmu ong. Molaokakanywa o  et e o swayaswayilwe ke set haba.2. Molaokakanywa wa Dit welet wa t a Mot oko le Didiri wa t a go Kgoga Mot oko t a Elektroniki wa 20182.1. Kabinete e dumelet e go i wa palamenteng Ditshwayotshwayo t a Molaokakanywa wa Dit welet wa t a Mot oko le Didiri wa t a go Kgoga Mot oko t a Elektroniki wa 2018, t eo di nyakago go phumola Molao wa gonabjale wa go Laola Dit welet wa t a Mot oko, (Molao wa 83 wa 1993) go ya le ka moo o mpshafadit wego ka gona.2.2. Molaokakanywa o nyaka go matlafat a magato a maphelo a set haba a naga gomme o dire gore o sepelelane le Tumelelano ya Tlhako ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo a Lefase ka ga Taolo ya Mot oko. Molaokakanywa o  i inya gare ga t e dingwe, gore go se sa folelwa ka gare ga meago le mafelo a mangwe a ka ntle ga meago; go fedi wa ga theki o ya sekerete mo met heneng ya go reki a, le go thekga taba ya diphuthelwana t a disekerete le maswao a temo o.2.3. Molaokakanywa o feti it we dikgatong t a go tsenelela t a go nyaka maikutlo a set haba a go fapana, go akaret a a intasteri ya met oko, a mekgatlo ya badudi le a dikgoro t a mmu o t a maleba.D. Ditiragalo t e di Tlago1. Kopano ya bo 77 ya Kopanokakaret o ya UN (UNGA77)1.1. Afrika Borwa e kgatha tema ka go UNGA77 yeo e lego ka go dikantorokgolo t a UN ka Toropokgolong ya New York ka USA go tloga ka la 27 Lewedi 2022 ka fase ga morero:  Nako ya mathata: Go t welet a ditharollo go kgokaganya ditlhohlo .1.2. Go Borwa bja lefase, khuet o ya ekonomi le ekonomi ya leago ya leuba la Bolwet i bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) e bile bothata kudu malebana le tso olo o go Leboa leo le hlabologilego gomme se se nyaka maitapi o ao a kopanet wego go t wa dinageng ka moka go kgonthi a gore ga go na yoo a tloget wego morago.1.3. Pele ga Ngangi ano ya Kakaret o ya UN, Mongwaledikakaret o wa UN, Morena Ant nio Guterres, o tla beakanya samiti ka ga  Go feto a Thuto  le go swara kopano ya maemo a godimo yeo e nepi ago Dinepo t a Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela (di-SDG). Kopano ya di-SDG e swanelwa ke go nyaki i a ditsela t eo go ka tso olo ago maatla le go potlaki a phethagat o.2. Let at i la Bohwa2.1. Mopresidente Ramaphosa o tla fa polelokgolo mo meketekong ya Let at i la Bohwa la Set haba mo Union Buildings ka Mokibelo, 24 Lewedi 2022. Moletlo o tla swarwa ka fase ga morero:  Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Set o wa Afrika Borwa .2.2. Kgwedi ye ya Bohwa e nepi a mmino wa set o wa Afrika Borwa ka nepi o ya mmino wa Isicathamiya le tema yeo o ikgathago go dipapadi, bokgabo, set o le bohwa. Morero o hlompha matswalo a bo 60 a go hlokofala ga rammino, seopedi le mot welet i Solomon Popoli Linda (1901-1962), yoo a tsebegago gape bjalo ka Solomon Ntsele, yoo a tsebegago kudu bjalo ka mot welet i wa ko a ya,  Mbube .3. Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Let at i la Dikepe la 20223.1. Afrika Borwa e tla be e swara Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Let at i la Dikepe la 2022 ka Durban go tloga ka la 14 Diphalane 2022. Moletlo o tla swarwa nakong ya OTM, woo le wona e tla bago karolo ya go godi a tsebo ya lekala la rena la dikepe. Moletlo o tla tli a baemedi go t wa dinageng t a go fapana bao ba tla itemogelang intasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa. Afrika Borwa e bile leloko la Mokgatlo wa Dikepe wa Bodit habat haba go tloga ka 1995, woo o lego mokgatlo wa go ikgetha wa UN wa go laola dikepe.4. Kgwedi ya Boeti4.1. Kgwedi ya Boeti ngwaga wo e ketekwa ka fase ga morero wa Let at i la Boeti la Lefase (27 Lewedi) wa  Nagana gape ka Boeti . Boeti bja gae bo bohlokwa kudu mo go tso olo eng lekala la boeti, leo le kgathago tema kudu go GDP ya Afrika Borwa le go hlola mo omo.4.2. Kabinete e thabi wa ke gore lekala la kamogelo ya baeti le begile kgolo ya baeti ka morago ga nako ya COVID-19. Go t erwe maeto a gae a 15.2 milione mo seripeng sa mathomo sa 2022 e begile koket ego ya 114% ge go bapet wa le nako ya go swana ka 2021. Se se bont ha kaonafalo ya mmaraka ya nako ya go swana ka 2019, yeo e bonego maeto ao a t erwego a gae a 8.6 milione. Bjalo ka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Boeti, Kabinete e hlohlelet a maAfrika Borwa go t ea maeto a  Shortleft  go ya diprofense t a rena t a go fapana.4.3. Kabinete e amogela gape sephetho sa Air Belgium go fofi a difofane t a sehla go ya Afrika Borwa, go thoma kgwedi yona ye (Lewedi), seo se tla matlafat ago boeti gomme sa tii et a maemo a rena bjalo ka nepo ya boeti ya kgetho. Se tla akaret a difofane t a beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe go ya Motsekapa le Johannesburg.E. Melaet a1. Ditebogi oKabinete e lebogi a le go lakalet a t e dibotse go:Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Repabliki ya Kenya, yoo a hlomami it wego ka Labobedi, 13 Lewedi 2022, go latela dikgetho t a boset haba t a khut o t eo di swerwego ka la 9 Phato 2022. Motlat amopresidente David Mabuza o tsenet e tlhomami o legatong la Mopresidente Ramaphosa, le mmu o le batho ba Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa.South African Rugby Union le Toropokgolo ya Motsekapa go swara phadi ano ya bo seswai ya Rugby World Cup Sevens gare ga 9 le 11 Lewedi 2022. E be e le lekga la mathomo tiragalo ye ye bohlokwa e swarwa ke naga ya Afrika gomme barati ba diketekete bao ba e tsenet ego ba ilwe ba thabi wa ka dijo t a rugby le kamogelo ye e lemogwago ya Afrika Borwa.2. MahlokoKabinete e romela melaet a ya mahloko go malapa le bagwera ba:Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba bagolo ba babedi bao ba hlokofet ego mo kotsing ye  oro ka Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka Labohlano, 16 Lewedi 2022 ka morago ga go thulana ga lori le bene yeo e bego e namedit e bana ba sekolo.F. Bao ba Thwet wego Me omong1. Batho ka moka bao ba thwet wego me omong mangwalo a bona a dithuto a tla tii et wa le go netefat wa ka maleba.a. Morena Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale bjalo ka Molaodimogolophethi i (DG): Mokhomi inare wa Set haba wa Kgoro ya Ditirelo t a Tshokollo.b. Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati bjalo ka Motlat amolaodimogolophethi i (DDG: lefapheng la go  oma ka merero ya Dikolo t a Maokelo t a Thuto ya Godimo ka moka le ya Tlhabollo ya Ba omi mo Kgorong ya Maphelo.c. Morena Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki bjalo ka Mohlahlobimogolophethi i mo Kgorong ya Temo, Tso olo o ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagaed. Morena Phaswa Phineas Mamogale bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo wa Dit helete mo Kgorong ya Maphelo.2. Kabinete e dumelelana le go thwalwa ga batho ba me omong:a. Morena Tshediso Matona bjalo ka Mokhomi inare wa Khomi ene ya Matlafat o ya Ekonomi ya Bathobaso ka Kakaret o.b. Maloko a Kgorotsheko ya Boipilet o a Boto ya Difilimi le Diphatlalat o:Morena Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo);Mohumagadi Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mohumagadi Sisanda Nkoala;Mohumagadi Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mohumagadi Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Morena Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Morena James Shikwambana; leMohumagadi Manko Thalitha Bufffel (o thwet we gape).Dipot i o: Mohumagadi Phumla Williams   Seboleledi sa KabineteMogala: 083 501 0139

title: Pego ya Kopano ya Kabinete ye Swerwego ka Laboraro, 19 Diphalane 2022
text: A.  Merero ye Bohlokwa Seemong sa Bjale1.  T hirelet ego ya Meetse1.1.  Kabinete e lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba obamet e taelo ya go fokot wa ga meetse ye phethagadit wego dikarolong t e dingwe t a Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go boet a sekeng maemo a matamo. Matamo ka mehutahuta a ka fase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo kudu ka baka la dithemphereit ha t a go fi a t hirit hiri gola Gauteng, ebile nyakego ye golelago godimo ya meetse a gapeledit e Rand Water go fokot a ka bont i meetse ao a abelwago mebasepala. Rand Water e aba meetse a go nwega a mant i bathong ba go feta 11 milione go la Gauteng, dikarolong t e dingwe t a Mpumalanga, Freistata le Leboa Bodikela.1.2.  T ona diphokot o t e t a go se efogege di nepile go boloka kabo ya meetse ebile di tla dula di le gona go ba go fihlela ge seemo se kaonafala. Kabinete e dirile boipilet o set habeng go t welapele go obamela magato a phokot o ya meetse le go kgatha tema ya bona ka go a  omi a ka tshwanelo ka ge e le sediri wa sa go hlokwa kudu.2.  Mogwanto wa Transnet 2.1.  Kabinete e amoget e kwano ya meputso ya mengwaga ye meraro ye kwanet wego ke Transnet le Yunione ya Mohlakanelwa ya Boset haba ya Dinamelwa (UNTU), ye e tlo diri wago pakeng ya 1 Moranang 2022 go fihla ka la 31 Hlakola 2025. Khomi ene ya Poelano, Bonamodi le Ditheri ano e namot e kwano ye, gomme magato a bona a dirile gore boipelaet o ka maloko a UNTU bo fedi we ka ponyo ya leihlo. Kabinete e amoget e gape sephetho sa go fedi a mogwanto ka Yunione ya Dinamelwa ya Afrika Borwa le ya Ba omi.2.2.  Kabinete e amoget e boikgafo bja Transnet bja go bea  edi godimo ga go fedi a dit halelomorago t e bilego gona go ralala boemakepe le dipeakanyong t a ditimela nakong ya magato a boipelaet o, ao a bilego le seabe se se mpe ikonoming le makaleng ao a tshepet ego godimo ga Transnet go aba ditirelo. 2.3.  Kabinete e bont hit e tebogo ya yona godimo ga thekgo le t homi anommogo ye laedit wego ke dikgwebo ka nako ya mogwanto. E hlohlelet a kamano ye sa felego magareng ga balaodi ba Transnet le ba omi gore khamphani ye le ikonomi ya naga ka bophara di holege.3.  Dikamano t a Afrika Borwa le Saudi Arabia 3.1.  Kabinete e amoget e Ketelo ya Mo omo ye atlegilego ya go ya kua the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la 15 le 16 Diphalane 2022. Nakong ya keteko ye, dinaga t e ka bobedi di saenet e Dimemorantamo t e 17 t a Kwe i ano go magoro a go fapafapana a go swana le temo, boreatlhapi, meepo, enet i ya go mp hafat ega, t hirelet ego, dinamelwa le temo ya diphedi le dimela t a ka meetseng. Dimemorantamo t e dingwe t a kwe i ano t eo di saenet wego ke t a mabapi le go hlongwa ga Khansele ya Mohlakanelwa ya Dikgwebo, t homi ano legorong la diintasteri t a se ole le ditheki et ano, t homi ano ya ditekolonyaki i o t a thutaswika.3.2.  Mopresidente o  omi it e ketelo ye go mema dikgwebo t a Saudi Arabia go iponagat a khonferenseng ya bohlano ya dipeelet o ya Afrika Borwa ye tlo swarwago ka 2023. Saudi Arabia ke mogwebi ani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa seleteng sa Bohlabelagare ebile ke mothopo wo mogologolo wa diromelwa ka nageng go t wa go sona selete se. Dikamano t a bodit habat haba magareng ga dinaga t e ka bobedi di bile le ditlamorago t e botse godimo ga ditlwaedi t a kgwebi ano le dipeelet o.4.  Dipeelet o t a Mananeokgoparara4.1.  Kabinete e amoget e go thongwa ga polante ya t welet o ya plastiki ya maemo a godimodimo lefaseng ka khampani ya go dira plastiki yeo e t wago pele maemong a bodit habat haba, ya go bit wa ALPLA Group, go la Lanseria kua Gauteng.4.2.  Se se tlalelet a maikgafo a Mopresidente Ramaphosa a go bea sekeng tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara bjalo ka mokgwa wa go hlohlelet a kgolo ya ikonomi le go ati a me omo. 4.3.  Dipeelet o t a boleng bja US$50 milione di kgatha tema ye kgolo godimo ga Leanolegolo la Toropo ya Mabonwa ya Lanseria leo le tlo hlohlelet ago seemo seo se tielet ego le t homi oleswa le gape go hlola le go  irelet a me omo ye 350. Godimo ga dipeelet o t e go akaret wa le lenaneo la go ithutela mo omo la batsebi ba 36 ba boint ineere bja dikgerekgere le ba t homi ogape ba ditiro t a ALPLA Group go ralala selete sa Borwa bja Afrika. Lenaneo le la boithutelamo omo le tlo thoma ka 2023, ka baithutelamo omo ba mathomo ba 12 ba MaAfrika Borwa ba go t wa mafelong a ka mo nageng.5.  Meepo ye Sego Molaong5.1.  Meepo ye sego molaong e kwe a set haba bohloko le go gobat a ikonomi ya gaborena, ebile dipoelo t a yona ke tobo ya letseno go bobedi mmu o le lefapha la meepo. 5.2.  Kabinete e amoget e go amogwa ga dithunya t eo di bego di utilwe le go golegwa ga bagononelwa ba 20 ba go amana le meepo ye sego molaong ka nako ya lesolophuruphut o kua mokoting wa moepo wa Stilfontein go la Leboa Bodikela.5.3.  Kabinete e dira boipilet o go MaAfrika Borwa go t welapele go  omi ana le mabotho a phethagat o ya molao go netefat a go atlega ga masolo a kamoso a twant ho ya bosenyi. Se se tla romela molaet a wo bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo thu e ka selo, le gore badirabosenyi ba tlo golegwa le go seki wa ntle poifo goba go  okelwa. 6. Enet i 6.1.  Eskom e saenet e dikwanelo t a go hiri a t a mengwaga ye 30 gotee le babeelet i ba bane ba bat welet i ba go ikema ba mohlagase go aga met hene ye mefsa ya go fehla enet i ya go hlweka kua diti ing t a mohlagase t a Majuba le Tutuka gola Mpumalanga. Khiri o ye ya seripa sa naga e tla goket a dipeelet o t e phopholedit wego t a go batamela R40 bilione.6.2.  Babeelet i ba ba bane   HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Solar Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa   ba tlo fehla mohlagase wa go lekana dimekawate t e 2 000 godimo ga mohlagase wa go t welet wa set habeng.6.3.  Phehlo ye ye mpsha ya mohlagase go letet we gore e kgokaganywe le mohlagase wo o t welet wago nageng ka bophara mo dikgweding t e 24 go fihla go t e 36 go tloga ge ngwaga wo wa dit helete o fela, ka go latela ditumelelo t a tikologo, t a karolo ya mafelo le t e dingwe t a taolo.7.  T hirelet ego ya Dijo7.1.  Kabinete e amoget e go swarwa ka mo nageng ga Lekgotla la 2022 la Agri SA go la Pretoria ka la 13 le la 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fase ga morero wo:  Kgodi o ya T welet o ya ka Nageng . Lekgotla le le reri ane ka merero ya go swana le go dira gore maanakgolo a temo a  omele bat welet i ba ka mo nageng; mananeokgoparara a go swarelela a dijo t a go t welet wa ka mo nageng; go dira gore tikologo ya ka mo nageng e t ee nako ye telele godimo ga t welet o ya dijo ya ka mo nageng le ka bokamosong, le go matlafat a mabokgoni a t welet o ya dijo go diri a dit welet o t eo di t weledit wego ka mo nageng.7.2.  Ka gona go bea pele t hirelet ego ya dijo kamoso, Kabinete e amoget e go tsebagat wa ga Hapo ya Boset haba ya T hirelet ego ya Tlhago, ka Kgoro ya Saense le Lenaneo la Kgwebi ano ya Temo ya Ikonomi ya Diphedi, ka t homi ano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria. Hapo ye e tla thekga thibelo, phokot o le taolo ya dipuno le malwet i a diphoofolo, ao a tlo bago le seabe sa t welet o ye hlatloget ego godimo, t hirelet ego ya dijo le tlhabollo ye swarelelago ya dinagamagae.B.  Diphetho t a Kabinete1.  Go Dumelelwa ga T hatha ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) ya go Hlongwa ga Makala1.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e tlhagi o Palamenteng ga T hatha ya AU ka Mehola le Metheo ya go Hlongwa ga Makala, Pu oselegae le Tlhabollo ya ka Nageng gore e dumelelwe. Afrika Borwa e saenet e t hatha ye ka Phato 2021. 1.2.  T hatha ye ya go Hlongwa ga Makala e fana ka tlhako go mebu o ka moka ye lego maloko ka sengwalwa sa tlhahlo ka khuet o ya go hlongwa ga makala le mehola ya ona go tloga mmu ong wa boset haba go ya didikong t e dingwe t a mmu o. T hatha ye e swaragane kudu le phatlalat o ya taolo le mehola, tlhako ya pu o le tlhabollo ya ka mo nageng.2.  Khansele ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Bodit habat haba ya Polokego ya Ditimela (IRSC)2.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e go swarwa ga Kopano ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya IRSC gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 1 go fihla ka la 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fase ga morero wo:  Pheto o ya sebopego sa ditimela mo Lefaseng leo go sa tsebjego t a kamoso .2.2.  IRSC ke foramo ya bodit habat haba ya go kopant ha mmogo ditsebi t a polokego ya ditimela go t wa lefaseng ka bophara go fana maitemogelo go kaonafat a polokego ya ditimela. 2.3.  Bjalo ka leloko la IRSC, Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Polokego ya Ditimela e swere foramo ye la mafelelo ka 2015.3.  Seakanywa sa Leano la Boset haba sa Mananeokgoparara a 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya 23.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e phatlalat o kuranteng ya mmu o ya Kgato ya Bobedi ya seakanywa sa NIP sa 2050 gore set haba se fe ditshwayotshwayo t a sona. Leano le le fa tlhahlo matlafat ong le kaonafat ong ya diprot eke t e loget wego maano t a mmu o t a mohlakanelwa. 3.2.  Seakanywa se se hlaola diprot eke t e loget wego maano madulong a batho; mohlagase wa mmasepala; meetse; dilahlwa t e thata; dinamelwa t a banamedi; thuto le mananeokgoparara a maphelo; mananeokgoparara a tit ithale, le bosenyi le bomenet a.3.3.  Sebopego sa leano le se fana ka ponelopele ya fao go swanet ego go fiwa  edi, se fana ka phetleko ya seemo sa bjale, se hlatholla dipeelano t e bohlokwa t a go atlega le go bolela gore go swanet e gore go dirwe eng go fihlelela ponelopele ye. Se  i inya tshepedi o ya phethagat o ye swanet ego go latelwa mo leanong la magato la go gagaba tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro.4.  Tlhako ya Phethagat o ya Boset haba ya go Fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong t a Mmu o 4.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e Tlhako ya Phethagat o ya Boset haba ya go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong t a Mmu o. Tlhako ye e phatlaladit we ka 2021 gore set haba se nt he sa mafahleng a sona. 4.2.  Tlhako ye e fana ka maikokotlelo a mahlano mo magatong a go hloma bokgoni Ditirelong t a Mmu o. Metheo ye ya boikokotlelo e akaret a kgoket o ya pele o tsena le tlhokolo mo Ditirelong t a Mmu o; kgakolo le tlwaet o; thulaganyo le taolo ya bodiragat i; thuto ye t welagopele, kgatelopele ya kgetho ya mo omo le ditiragalo t a mabapi le kgetho ya mo omo.5.  Diphetogo ka Gare ga Dipeelano t a Mo omo t a Balaodipharephare (di-DG)5.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e pego ya go  i inya magato a go matlafat a mabokgoni le bokgoni bja Balaodipharephare (di-DG) Ditirelong t a Mmu o. Pego ye e dirile dit hi inyo t e mmalwa, go akaret wa le paka ya ka kantorong ya di-DG le taolo ya baromiwa ka Lekgotlaphethi i go bahlankedi ba taolo. 5.2.  Pego ye e  i int e gape le gore Molaodipharephare Kantorong ya Mopresidente o tla neelwa Hlogo ya Ditirelo t a Mmu o. Kua diprofenseng, mo omo wo o tla neelwa Balaodipharephare dikantorong t a Ditonakgolo. Pego ye e  i int e gape le magato a go hlahla dikgoro ka taolo ya dikontraka le Balaodipharephare.5.3.  Peakanyo ye Fetlekilwego ya Taolo ya Bodiragat i go Balaodipharephare e gare e ya fetlekwa gore e gate ka mo ito o tee le diphetogo t eo di dumelet wego.5.4.  Tona ya Mot waoswere ya Ditirelo t a Mmu o le Tsamai o, Ntate Thulas Nxesi, o tlare mo bekeng ye tlago a sware kopano ya tshedimo et o ya babegaditaba go hlatholla Tlhako ya Boset haba ya Phethagat o go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong t a Mmu o le gape go hlatholla gabotse diphetogo t e dumelet wego dipeelanong t a go thwalwa ga Balaodipharephare.6.  Pego ya Bohlano ya Mo omo ka Phethagat o ya Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo t a Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (WPRPD) 2020-20216.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e Pego ya Bohlano ya Mo omo ka phethagat o ya WPRPD, yeo e fanago ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagat o ya WPRPD. Pego ye e akaret a le ditshwayotshwayo go t wa dikgorong t a mmu o t a boset haba le t a profense. E fana ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagat o ya pholisi ye akaret ago diriparipana t a ditekanyet okabo. 6.2.  Pego ya mathomo ya seemo sa mo omo ya ngwaga ka ngwaga e phatlaladit we ka 2017. Pego ye ya bohlano e dumelet we go gati wa kuranteng ya mmu o le go phatlalat wa ke Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.7.  Pheto o ya Athikele ya 20(1) ya Kopano ya Phedi o ya Mehuta ka Moka ya Kgethollo Kgahlanong le Basadi (CEDAW)7.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e tlhagi o Palamenteng ya Pheto o ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore e dumelelwe. Dipheto o t e di fana ka nako ye telet ana ya dikopano t a komiti t a go lebelela dipego t a mebu o ye lego maloko.7.2.  Afrika Borwa e saenet e kwano ye ka 1993 le go e dumelela moragonyana ga fao ka Manthole 1995. Tlhagi o ye Palamenteng e  et ane le go tsamai a ka mo ito o tee kwano ye e dumelet wego kua morago gotee le pheto o ya Athikele 20(1) ya kwano ye.8.  Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo a Thuto Mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana8.1.    Kabinete e dumelet e tlhagi o Palamenteng ya Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo a Thuto mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana gore e dumelelwe. Ge e  et e e dumelet we e tla romelwa Mokgatlong wa Dit habakopano (UN) wa Thuto, Saenthefiki le t a Set o le go kgont hwa go  oma ka mo nageng ka Molao wa Boset haba wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo a Thuto, 2008 (Molao 67 wa 2008).8.2.    Kwano ye ya Lefase ka Bophara e hloma metheo ya motlalanaga ya temogo ya go se t ee lehlakore le ya go se kgetholle ya mangwalo a thuto ya godingwana le mangwalo a thuto ka kakaret o. E dumelela temogo ya mangwalo a thuto a dinaga ele mo mebu o ye 193 ye lego maloko a UN.9.    Kgogelomorago ya Dipheto o t a Tlhahli ya Maloko a Komitiphethi i9.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e kwalakwat o ye kwalakwadit wego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente ka Mo upologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogelamorago dipheto o t eo di dirilwego go Tlhahli ya Maloko a Komitiphethi i, yeo e bit wago Pukukgakollo ya Ditona, ya 2022.9.2.  Dipheto o t e di dirilwego ka Moranang 2022 di fane ka thekgo ya tlalelet o go t e dingwe t a dikantoro t a Ditona t eo di rwelego maikarabelo a lefapha la go feta le tee. Dipheto o t e di be di nyaka gore Mmu o o rwale maikarabelo ka botlalo a disenyegelo t a go amana le kabo ya mohlagase le meetse madulong a semmu o a go dulwa ke maloko a komitiphethi i. 9.3.  Kabinete e lemogile dipelaelo t eo di hlagi it wego ke maloko a set haba ebile e t eere sephetho sa go sekaseka Tlhahli ya Maloko a Komitiphethi i. Tshepedi o ye e  oga ogwa ke setheo sa go se t ee lehlakore ebile ge e fihlile mafelelong, tlhahli ye e tlo phatlalat wa set habeng ka wepsaete ye ya Kgoro ya Ditirelo t a Mmu o le Tsamai o: www.dpsa.gov.za.10.  Kgwerano Diphetogong t a Enet i t a go se T ee Lehlakore (JETP) le Leano la Dipeelet o la JETP (JETP-IP)10.1.  Ka morago ga go amogela tlhagi o ka JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete e thekgile ka atla pedi J ETP-IP le go laet a ka fao e kgotsofet ego ka gona ka mo omo wa go tsenelela wo o dirilwego go e kaonafat a. 10.2.  JETP-IP e hlatholla dipeelet o t eo di nyakegago go fihlelela maikgafo a go fedi a khabone ao a dirilwego ke Mmu o wa Afrika Borwa mola ka go le lengwe go hlohlelet wa tlhabollo ya go swarelela nako ye telet ana, le go netefat a gore go fihlelelwa diphetogo t a go se t ee lehlakore go ba omedi bao ba amegago le set haba. 10.3.  Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona ka Phetogo ya Klaemete e tlare go se goye kae ya swara tshedimo et o le babegaditaba go fana ka tshedimo o ka botlalo.C.  Melaokakanywa1.  Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe t a Bagwebi1.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e tlhagi o Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe t a Bagwebi gore o lebelelwe goya pele. Molaokakanywa wo o mpshafat a Molao wa Dinamelwakepe t a Bagwebi wa go ba le mengwaga ye 70 ka bogolo, 1951 (Molao 57 wa 1951).1.2.  Ge o  et e o dumelet we, Molaokakanywa wo o tlo fana ka tlhako ya semolao ya dinamelwakepe t a Bagwebi go laola magatokamano a dikepe. Molaokakanywa wo, magareng ga t e dingwe, o tla laola tlhamo, boingwadi o, go rea maina le go nt hwa ga dikepe.1.3.  Dipheto o t e di tlo ba le seabe tso olo ong ya lefapha la dinamelwa t a mabopong le go tsamai a naga ye ka mo ito o tee le Kwano ya Mokgatlo wa Bodit habat haba wa t a Mabopo. Afrika Borwa e dumelet e kwano ye.2.  Molaokakanywapheto wa wa 2020 wa Dipalopalo 2.1.  Kabinete e dumelet e tlhagi o Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywapheto wa wa 2022 gore o lebelelwe goya pele. Molaokakanywa wo o  i inya pheto o ya Molao wa Dipalopalo, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999). Dipheto o t e di fana ka tlhabollo le phethagat o ya Peakanyo ya Boset haba ya Dipalopalo yeo e thekgago diphetho t a go ba le bohlatse. 2.2.  Di matlafat a t homi ano ye lego gona magareng ga Dipalopalo t a Afrika Borwa le ditho t e dingwe t a mmu o, ebile di nabi a tlhako ya taolo ya Molao wo.D.  Ditiragalo t eo di Tlago1.  Samiti ya Boset haba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, t e Nnyane le t a Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi1.1.  Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Dikgwebo t e Nnyane, ka kgwebi ano le bakgathatema ba lefapha la praebete, e tla swara Samiti ya Boset haba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, t e Nnyane le t a Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi gola Bryanston, Gauteng go tloga ka la 13 go fihla ka la 15 Dibatsela 2022.1.2.  Samiti ye e tla kopant ha mmogo bakgathatema ba bohlokwa ba praebete le ba lekala la mmu o ka gare ga peakanyo ya dikgwebo t e nnyane, go reri ana ka go hwet a ditsela t a go  omi ana mmogo go matlafat a lefapha le. Bakgathatema bao ba letet wego ba akaret a lekgotla la dikgwebo, ditsebi t a di-SMME, bahlami ba dipholisi le ditheo t a tlhabollo ya dit helete.1.3.  Samiti ye e tla reri ana le ka Leanolegolo la Boset haba la Mohlakanelwa la Dikgwebo t e Nnyane, leo le fanago ka tlhako ye loget wego maano ya go matlafat a lefapha la di-SMME. Samiti ye go letet we gape gore e tsebagat e Difoka t a Ngwaga ka Ngwaga t a Boset haba t a Mopresidente t a di-SMME.2.  Go Swarwa ga Samiti ya bo-2022 ya Dikgaruru t a go Ikala ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi 2.1.  Mopresidente Ramaphosa o tla swara Samiti ya Bobedi ya Mopresidente ya GBVF kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Gallagher gola Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Dibatsela 2022. Samiti ya mathomo ye bego e swerwe ka 2018 e  omi it we go itlama ka boswa ga mmu o le bagwebi ani ba leago go fedi a ditiragalo t e lego godimo t a dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi ka mo nageng. 2.2.  Samiti ya bobedi e tla  omi wa go sekaseka pele kgatelopele ye fihlelet wego ya Leano la Boset haba le Loget wego Maano ka GBVF. Yona e tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo:  Boikarabelo, Potlaki o le Tlalelet o GONA BJALE . 2.3.  Samiti ye e tla reri ana ka, magareng ga t e dingwe, go hwet a mekgwa ya go potlaki a magato le boikarabelo go t wa dikgorong t e bohlokwa le bakgathatema ka moka ba go akaret a mekgatlo ye lego set habeng, lefapha la praebete le ba omi. 3.  Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente kua Kapa Leboa3.1.  Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Bohlano wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM) go la Upington, Kapa Leboa e tla phethagala ka Labohlano, 21 Diphalane 2022 Lepatlelong la fao la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium. 3.2.  Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM e tlo sekaseka kgatelopele ya kabo ya ditirelo le ditlhotlo t a kua Kapa Leboa le go tsena seemo seo ka bogare go rarolla ditlhotlo t eo. DDM e netefat a gore thulaganyo ya kabo ya ditirelo, phethagat o le bolekanyet i e ba monwana le lenala go kaonafat a kabo ya ditirelo bathong. 3.3.  Ka gona go itoki et a Imbizo ye, Ditona, maloko a makgotlaphethi i le dimeyara ba tlo tsenela ditiragalo t a go fihlelela set haba ka gare ga Upington le go e potologa. 4.  Pego ya Pholisi ya Tekanyet okabo ya Paka ya Magareng (MTBPS) 4.1.  Kabinete e dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 yeo e tlo hlagi wago ke Tona ya Dit helete Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo ye bohlokwa ya tshepedi o ya phatlalat a le ya boikarabelo ya bolekanyet i. 4.2.  MTBPS ke mokgwa wa go phethagat a maikgafo a mmu o ntle le go feti a magomokakaret o a disenyegelo ao mmu o o ka a kgonang. E hlatholla goya pele ka fao mmu o o tla netefat ago gore disenyegelo ga di fete letseno, le go dira t e nt i ka didiri wa t e lego gona. 5.  Ditlhahlobo t a Marematlou5.1.  Ditlhahlobo t a 2022 t a Boset haba t a Mphato wa Marematlou di thoma ka la 31 Diphalane le go fela ka la 7 Manthole 2022. Kabinete e lakalet a Barutwana ba Marematlou ba 2022 mahlatse le mahlogonolo ge ba le gare ba tsena kgatong ya mafelelofelelo ya leeto la dithuto t a bona. Thekgo ye t welagopele go t wa go baruti i, batswadi le bahlokomedi e tla fihla kgole go thu a bona barutwana ba go itebanya le ditlhahlobo t e ka boitshepho. 5.2.  Kabinete e hlohlelet a batswadi le bahlokomedi go kgatha tema ya bona ka go hlohlelet a le go  u umet a barutwana, le go dira gore go kgonagale gore ba kgone go ithuta ge ba le gae.6.  Leanotlhabollo la Boset haba (NDP) le Khonferense ya Mabokgoni a Mmu o6.1.  Kgoro ya Ditirelo t a Mmu o le Tsamai o, ka t homi ano le Khomi ene ya Boset haba ya Dithulaganyo le Sekolo sa Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal sa Thutotlhabollo, e tlo swara Khonferense ya NDP le ya Mabokgoni a Mmu o go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 9 Dibatsela 2022 Khamphaseng ya Kholet e ya Howard, Yunibesithing ya KwaZulu-Natal. 6.2.  Khonferense ye e tlo lebelela mabokgoni a mmu o a bodiragat i ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP, ebile e tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo:  Tebeledi i o ya Mabokgoni a Mmu o le Bodiragat i bja Mmu o ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP .7.  Neelano ya Sethikifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgo i Misuzulu KaZwelithini Bjalo ka Kgo i7.1.  Mopresidente Ramaphosa o tla neelana ka Sethifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgo i Misuzulu KaZwelithini bjalo ka Kgo i Lepatlelong la Moses Mabhida go la Durban ka Mokibelo, 29 Diphalane 2022. 7.2.  Se se latela moletlo wa set o wa go hlomami a kgo i wa go bit wa  Ukungena eSibayeni  wa yena Kgo ikgolo wo o bego o swerwe ka la 20 Phato 2022, fao go ona a hlomami it wego bjalo ka kgo i ya Set haba sa MaZulu.E.  Melaet a1.  Ditebogi oKabinete e lebi a ditebogi o t a yona le go lakalet a bao ba latelago mahlatse: Ntate Sam Matekane, Tonakgolo ya Mmu o wa Lesotho. Kabinete e bile le Baromiwa ba AU ba Bahlokomedi ba Dikgetho Dikgethong t a Kgothakgothe t a Boset haba Pu ong ya Lesotho ge ba be ba reta peakanyo ye budit wego ya dikgetho ya sepolotiki ya Batho ba Pu o ya Lesotho ge ba swere dikgetho t e atlegilego.  Afrika Borwa e sant e e ikgafet e go maatlafat a le go boelanya dikamano t a magareng ga dinaga gotee le go kaonafat a t homi ano mererong ya selete, ya kontinente le ya lefase ka bophara ya go tsenelana.2.  Mahloko Kabinete e lebi a mahloko a yona go ba lapa le bagwera ba: Ntate Albert Nolan (88), Moruti wa Boikgafo wa Kereke ya Afrika Borwa ya Khatholiki yo a bego a sa dumelelane le mebono ya sedumedi ya go hlohlelet a le go  irelet a peakanyo ya mmu o wa kgethollo. Ka 2003, Mopresidente wa nako yeo Thabo Mbeki o mo file Sefoka sa Luthuli sa Silibere ka boikgafo bja gagwe bja bophelo ka moka phenkgi anong ya temokrasi, ditokelo t a botho le toka le go se kwane le ditlwaedi t a sedumedi kudukudu t eo di fahlelago ka mabaka a go bea gabotse le go  irelet a mmu o wa kgethollo.  F.  Bao ba Thwet wego Me omong1.  Batho ka moka bao ba thwet wego me omong mangwalo a bona a thuto a tlo kgonthi i wa ka tsela ye maleba.a.  Moadbokheiti James Mlawu   Molaodipharephare: Kgoro ya Dinamelwa. b.  Ntate Shabeer Khan   Mmaledipharephare: Matlotlo a Boset haba.2.  Kabinete e kwanet e go thwalwa ga bao ba latelago:2.1.  Maloko a Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya t a Boeti:a.  Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modulasetulo);b.  Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlat a Modulasetulo);c.  Mme Pretty Ntombela;d.  Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai;e.  Ntate Odwa Mtati;f.  Ntate Ravi Nadasen (O thwet we leboelela);g.  Ntate Enver Duminy (O thwet we leboelela);h.  Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa;i.  Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe (O thwet we leboelela);j.  Mme Rosemary Anderson;k.  Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.  Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Kgoro).2.2.  Maloko a Boto ya Lekoko la Taolo ya Sephethephethe Mebileng:a.  Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe (O thwet we leboelela);b.  Mme Thandi Clara Thankge (O thwet we leboelela);c.  Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele;d.  Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo);e.  Moadbokheiti Xola Stemela;f.  Mme Lerato Magalo;g.  Moprofesara Chitja Twala;h.  Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana;i.  Mme N Jaxa (Moleloko wa Tlalelet o); le j.  Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Moleloko wa Tlalelet o).2.3.  Ntate Tshepo Monaheng   Mohlankediphethi imogolwane (CEO): Khamphani ya Kagodithokgwa ya Afrika Borwa (Kontraka ya gagwe e mpshafadit we tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro).2.4.  Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana   CEO: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Boset haba ya Ditsela. 2.5.  Mme Ditebogo Kgomo   CEO: Molekanyet i wa Boset haba wa Nyuklea.2.6.  Ntate Risenga Maluleka   Radipalopalopharephare (Kontraka e mpshafadit we).2.7.   Mme Kedibone Olga Madiehe   CEO: Kemedi ya Mmu o ya Tsamai o ya Diphen ene.Dinyaki i o: Mme Phumla Williams   Seboleledi sa Kabinete Mogala: 083 501 0139

title: Statement on the Cabinet Meeting of 2 November 2022
text: A. Issues in the environment1. Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF)1.1.  Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme:  Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!  1.2.  The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country s commitment to a united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF. 1.3.  Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide a multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen a coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as a whole. 1.4.  The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF. It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.1.5.  The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF. 1.6.  Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures. 1.7.  Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society. Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies. Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.2.    Safety and security  2.1.  Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS)   which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force   has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.2.2.  Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat. As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation. 2.3.  Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies. Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something   together we can keep the nation safe.3.  2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS)3.1.  Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking a dangerous turn for the worse. 3.2.  The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.3.3. The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters. The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation. 3.4.  Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.4.   South Africa   Spain relations4.1.  Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro S nchez P rez-Castej n of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries. The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and a business delegation.4.2.  The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.  This visit provided another boost to the country s investment and economic growth drive.5.  Ethiopia   Tigray Peace Talks5.1. South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October 2022. 5.2.  The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.5.3. Cabinet expressed its support for a peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa s foreign policy objectives of a secure and conflict-free continent.  B.  Cabinet Decisions1.  National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework 1.1.  Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation. The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in 2005. The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.1.2.  The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises. It provides a structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.   1.3.  In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment. Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is a forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.2.  Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities2.1. Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities. The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).2.2. The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.2.3.  It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities. It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.2.4.  South Africa is a signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa. 3.  Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting3.1. The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June 2023. The IPCC   which comprises a panel of 195-member governments under the UN   is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.3.2. During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect a new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle. Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.3.3.  Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa. She is currently a member of the IPCC Bureau. If elected she would be the first woman and a person from Africa to chair this body.  Her election will send a positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa. C. Upcoming events1.   2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign 1.1.
